'''Xubuntu'''<!-- (pronunciation unknown - see discussion) --> is an official derivative of the [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] [[Linux distribution]], using the [[Xfce]] [[desktop environment]]. Xubuntu is intended for users with less-powerful computers or those who seek a highly efficient desktop environment on faster systems.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.xubuntu.org|title=Xubuntu Home Page|accessdate=2007-09-03}}</ref> It features mostly [[GTK+]] applications.
'''Xubuntu'''<!-- (pronunciation unknown - see discussion) --> is an official derivative of the [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] [[Linux distribution]], using the [[Xfce]] [[desktop environment]]. Xubuntu is intended for users with less-powerful computers or those who seek a highly efficient desktop environment on faster systems.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.xubuntu.org|title=Xubuntu Home Page|accessdate=2007-09-03}}</ref> It features mostly [[GTK+]] applications.
